metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10150 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Use-after-free vulnerability in the kvm_ioctl_create_device function invirt/kvm/kvm_main.c in the Linux kernel before 4.8.13 allows host OS usersto cause a denial of service (host OS crash) or possibly gain privilegesvia crafted ioctl calls on the /dev/kvm device.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
linux-grouper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.

linux-lts-wily: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
